transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello haan haanji ji good morning Amit baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Vishwa ji baat kar rahe hai Nitish ji baat kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji baat kar rahe hai. Distrub to nahi kar raha hu aapko? Haan distrub boliye boliye. Distrub to nahi kar raha hu sir aapko? Thoda sa aap se baat karna chahta tha isliye.
Customer: Ji ji boliye boliye boliye.
Executive: Haan thoda.
Executive: To kaisi chal rahi hai sir service aapki?
Customer: Kuch nahi chal raha sir. Faltu ka paisa luta hai bas aap logo ne.
Executive: Kuch nahi sir. Maafi chahunga sir bata sakte hai kya problem aa rahi hai aapko? Kya aapki problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Problem kya hai aap dekh lo na yaar service usme maine sab kuch list kar rakha hai ek bhi related lead dikha do aap. Ek bhi ab tak call hua ho. Ek bhi call aaya ho ab tak aap dekh lo khud se. Aati hai idhar udhar ki pata nahi kya kya call aati hai kabhi koi kehta hai ceiling fan le lo.
Customer: Kabhi koi kuch le lo kabhi kuch le lo pagal banaya hai aapne faltu ka paisa loot ke.
Executive: Dekhiye sir abhi agar mai baat karu sir aapke by lead ke liye to aapne sir by lead bhi bahut kam use kari hai.
Customer: Sir use to tabhi karu malik jab aaye usme. Jitni bhi pehle ho rakhi hai by lead usme dekho. Koi koi kuch bolta hai koi kuch bolta hai. Koi kisi cheez ke liye kehta hai nahi hamara ye nahi ye kaam hai hame nahi chahiye ye nahi chahiye jabardasti ka lead bana ke dalte ho kya usme aap?
Executive: Nahi sir mai maafi chahunga sir ji jo bhi aapko problem hui magar aapne sir September me aapne sir sir 13 by lead sir liye the. Theek hai total jo hai aap aur uske baad aapne February me.
Customer: Aap un 13 leads ko na meri baat suno meri baat suno. 13 leads ko unko aap fir se approach karke dekho. Agar koi bhi related ho.
Executive: Hmm bilkul.
Customer: Ek bhi related nahi hai unme.
Executive: Sir dekhiye mai maan sakta hu sir ho sakta hai ye magar ab mai bas aapko yahi suggest karunga ki aapko har hafte sir 17 lead milti hai right. To 10 jo aapko starting me mil jati hai aur saat aapki har day din ki ek. Theek hai to aapne October me matlab kitni sari leads aapne aise chhod di hongi right ye bhi samajh sakte hai na mai ye samjhana chah raha hu ki aapne October me ek bhi lead de nahi November me ek bhi lead de nahi.
Customer: Aayi nahi to malik use kaha se to batao jab sari ulti seedhi lead aa rahi hai sari ki sari to kaha se use karu unko. Pe baitha rahu kya?
Executive: Nahi dekhiye ye mera kehne ka matlab ye nahi hai ki aap sirf pure din IndiaMART use kare but at least daily din me do lead to sir aap kar sakte hai na.
Customer: Maharaj nahi aati ek bhi yaar aap samjho mai bawla thodi hu jo paisa deke lead use nahi karunga ye batao na. Ya mere paas mere paas jyada aa raha tha isliye IndiaMART ko diya.
Customer: Ajeeb baat kar rahe ho yaar.
Customer: Ek bhi related nahi hai bhai refund ka pucha aapki team se keh raha refund ki policy nahi hoti. Aur usme jab plan liya tha us time pe bola tha nahi agar aapke kaam ka na ho to pura paisa wapas hoga. Fake commitment karke dalte ho kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi dekhiye sir aisa hota hai na mai bata deta hu isme kabhi kabhi fake hone me ye karan ho sakta hai ki maan lijiye agar koi Google pe aaya aur Google pe aate hi usne search kiya theek hai aapke product ke bare me to sabse pehle IndiaMART pe sir sabse pehle IndiaMART pe le jata hai to wo open kar lega by lead ban jata hai.
Customer: Sari fake aayegi theek hai?
Customer: Aap meri service dekho agar ek bhi aap aap khud call karke dekho mere end se agar ek bhi dikh jaye aapko. Refund ka kya process hai aap ye bataiye. Sab free sab chhod do.
Executive: Dekhiye abhi sir mai kuch samay pehle dekh raha hu mai sir aapki bar refund ka kya process hai mai ye puch raha hu.
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar refund ka kya process hai mai ye puch raha hu sir aap suno meri baat mujhe aur kuch baate nahi karni extra na. Dekhiye wo mai sir aapko bata wo mai sir aapko surely bata dunga but aap sochiye ki aapne agar ek saal ke liye koi service li hai aur aap teen mahine ya ek mahine use karke bolte hai to is cheez se sir aapko bhi like sochni chahiye na sir business to sir time se ek timely aata hai right agar aapko ek saal me ek bar business bhi aa jata hai to aapko profit aapka hoga na ghata to hoga nahi sir usme koi bhi cheez nahi karna hai yaar continue nahi karna pagal banate ho aap log bas aur kuch nahi hai aap refund ka process batao.
Customer: Kisse baat karni padegi kaise karni padegi kaha wo karna padega inko tag kaise karna padega batao.
Executive: Okay sir mai sir aapko na abhi mai aapki jo ek call back arrange kara deta hu mai sir agar aapko theek lagta hai to aap unse baat karke seedhe aage continue kar sakte hai theek hai. Do se teen baje ka arrange kara na theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai do se teen ke beech me bilkul mai arrange kara deta hu. Theek.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Feels like he is being cheated.

- Wants to know the refund process.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive offered a callback to discuss refund process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a callback between 2-3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, service
